first_translate: the hunting competition came to an end...
...thanks to my efforts that day.
and now...
wow...

hangle: 정말 전부 제 앞으로 온 선물인가요?
first_translate: all these gifts are for me?
that’s right.

hangle: 사냥 대회에서 도와준 것에 대한 감사의 표시라 하더군.
first_translate: I was told they’re tokens of gratitude from those I helped during the hunt.
is that so...?

hangle: 수도는 마물 피해가 없다며 심드렁하던 놈들이 발등에 불이 붙었다.
first_translate: now everyone seems to have woken up after being indifferent about the monster attacks because “the capital wasn’t affected.”

hangle: 드디어 죽은 땅에 학자들과 토벌대를 파견한다더군.
first_translate: apparently, scholars and subjugation troops will finally be sent out to deal with the dead lands.
in any case...

hangle: 일이 눈앞에 닥쳐야 좀 움직이기 시작하지.
first_translate: it looks like people only start taking action once things get serious enough.
this must’ve been quite bitter news for house haylon.

hangle: 어쩔 수 없죠. 본래 사람 심리가 자신에게 닥치고서야 심각해진다잖아요.
first_translate: but what can you do? humans tend to take matters seriously only when their own interests are at stake.
even though this world was created by me...
still,
maybe things will change from here on out.
I’m not too sure.

hangle: 가만 보면 아벨도 은근 염세적이란 말이야.
first_translate: when you think about it, even abel has his pessimistic side.

hangle: 하긴… 그나마 중앙에서 진지하게 마물에 대해 논했던 사람이
first_translate: come to think of it, aren’t you the one person who took monsters seriously before all this happened?
then again, there weren’t many others besides arendt who did either.
by the way, how are you doing physically?
good.
I feel fine now.

hangle: 사냥 대회에서는 힘을 잔뜩 써서 결국 쓰러졌었지.
first_translate: she used her powers excessively during the hunting competition and ended up collapsing.
no wonder she needs someone looking over her shoulder.
siegren made the first move.

hangle: 정신을 차리고도 컨디션을 회복하기 위해 침대에서 며칠 동안 꾸물거려야 했어…
first_translate: even after waking back up, she had to spend several days recovering in bed...

hangle: 쉴 수 있을 때 푹 쉬거라.
first_translate: make sure to rest well while you still can.

hangle: 쉴 수 있을 때 푹 쉬거라.
first_translate: make sure to rest well while you still can.

hangle: 보아하니 이럴 수 있는 날도 앞으로 별로 없을 것 같으니.
first_translate: from the look of things, I don’t imagine you’ll have much chance to relax anymore.
haha...

hangle: 이게 다 모두 사교계 초대장이란 말이죠…
first_translate: I guess this is why I received invitations to join high society events...
it appears I’ll also make my debut into high society soon...
to be honest, I’m not very confident about dealing with nobles.

hangle: 뭐, 황후 쪽의 귀부인들만 조심하면 되겠지.
first_translate: well, as long as you watch yourself around the ladies-in-waiting loyal to the empress, everything else shouldn’t matter.
if only livia could help us out.

hangle: 중간에 사냥대회가 중지되었으니 그녀와의 계약도 백지가 돼버렸어.
first_translate: because the hunting competition got cut short, our contract became nullified.
haa...
does this mean we’re going solo from now on?
fiona.
what is it?
I heard you’ve been training frequently lately.

hangle: 수도 근처의 숲에 변형된 마물이 나타난 거잖아.
first_translate: modified monsters started appearing near the forest close to the capital city.

hangle: 단련시킬 수 있을 때 해 놔야지.
first_translate: I need to train myself whenever possible.
try not to push yourself too hard.
you already have plenty of enemies within the palace walls.
it’s too late for that.
as you know,

hangle: 난 그리 사교성 좋은 성격이 아니거든.
first_translate: my personality isn’t exactly suited for making friends easily.
that’s precisely the problem.

hangle: 시그렌은 마음을 터놓고 대화할 상대를 만들지 않아.
first_translate: siegren doesn’t let anyone become close enough to talk openly with him.
while some may admire siegern in hailon,
there hasn’t been anyone he’d call friend.

hangle: 마음 터놓을 친구 하나 없는 건,
first_translate: not having a single friend to confide in...
...makes him seem rather lonely sometimes.

hangle: 이성 친구인 내게 털어놓을 수 없는 문제도 분명 있을 텐데.
first_translate: plus, there might be issues he wouldn’t want to share with me since I’m a woman.

hangle: 소설을 쓸 때 시그렌에게 친구 한 명은 만들어야 했어.
first_translate: I really should’ve given siegern a friend when writing the novel.
siegren, I keep telling you this,
but I hope you gain everything...
...and live happily ever after.
yup, I agree.
I appreciate your concern, fiona.

hangle: 하지만 다른 사람을 신뢰하는 시도를 해보는 건 솔직히 불가능해.
first_translate: but honestly speaking, trying to trust other people is impossible for me.
on top of that,
you don’t have any friends aside from me either.
oof.
I can’t deny that fact.
I didn’t have any friends either!

hangle: 지금 네가 나한테 잔소리할 게 아니라고.
first_translate: who are you to lecture me anyway?
true.

hangle: 내가 먼저 친구를 만들고, 시그렌에게 친구가 생긴 행복함을 보여줬어야 했는데.
first_translate: I should’ve found friends first and shown siegern the joy of friendship.

hangle: 피오나, 지금 너 이상한 쪽으로 생각이 튀고 있지.
first_translate: fiona, where are you headed with this line of thinking?

hangle: 아니, 매우 올바른 생각을 하고 있는데.
first_translate: I’m just saying something perfectly reasonable.
let me show you what real sociability looks like.
at any rate,

hangle: 너도 이제 본격적으로 중앙에서의 활동을 시작할 거지?
first_translate: are you starting your activities in earnest now?
yeah, but I gotta sort through all these invitations first.

hangle: 그럼, 당분간 내 궁에는 오지 마.
first_translate: okay then. try not to come visit me until further notice.
do I bother you or something?

hangle: 내가 달리 갈 곳이 없어서 시그렌에게 너무 자주 찾아왔나?
first_translate: have I visited siegern too often because I have nowhere else to go?

hangle: 아니면 친구를 사귀라고 잔소리해서 그런 걸까?!
first_translate: or maybe it’s because I lectured him about finding friends?!
stop letting your imagination run wild.
none of them are correct.
then why?

hangle: 이번에 내 궁에 새로운 기사가 배정되었거든.
first_translate: a new knight was assigned to serve under me recently.
that knight happens to belong to house ereze.

hangle: 에레즈 후작가면, 대표적인 황태자 지지 가문이군.
first_translate: house ereze is known to support the crown prince wholeheartedly.

hangle: 거기 가문 사람이 네 궁으로 들어왔다고?
first_translate: so someone from that family joined your service?
their intentions couldn’t be more obvious.
they probably intend to spy on me.

hangle: 사실 쫓아내려 했지만… 유감스럽게도 꼬투리 잡을 거리가 없어서.
first_translate: truthfully, I wanted to chase him away, but unfortunately, there’s nothing wrong with him.

hangle: 그러니 당분간은 내 궁에 출입하지 마.
first_translate: thus, please refrain from visiting my palace for the time being.
just in case anything goes awry.

hangle: 적어도 내가 그자를 쫓아내 버릴 때까지 말이야.
first_translate: at least until I manage to kick him out.
alright.
I’m sure you’ll handle it properly, seeing as you’re siegren.

hangle: 헤일론 식으로 쫓아내질 그 사람이 불쌍하다…
first_translate: poor guy getting kicked out the hailon way...
oh, lady livia.
please come in.
how elegant you always appear.
thank you for your kind words,
your majesty.

hangle: 매력적인 네가 혼기가 다 차도록 홀몸이라니 믿을 수 없구나.
first_translate: it’s unbelievable such a charming young lady remains unmarried despite reaching marriageable age.

hangle: 우리 어머니도 아닌데 무슨 혼기 이야기를…
first_translate: why would you bring up marriage if you’re not my mother...?

hangle: 나이만 찼지, 아직 한참 부족한 점이 많은 몸입니다.
first_translate: I may be old enough, but I am far from perfect yet.
your humility makes you even lovelier.

hangle: 하지만 사람이란 게 다 때가 있는 법이지.
first_translate: but timing plays a crucial role in life.
let’s see...
what do you think of my son, enoch?

hangle: 조금 욱하는 경향이 있어서 그렇지 심성은 좋단다.
first_translate: although he tends to lose his temper occasionally, he’s good-natured.
enoch loses his temper every now and then?

hangle: 에녹도 널 마음에 들어 하는 눈치던데?
first_translate: I believe enoch likes you as well.
you understand better than most...

hangle: 한창때의 남녀가 같이 서면 얼마나 잘 어울릴까.
first_translate: ...that men and women reach their prime together.
yes, you’re absolutely right.

hangle: 하지만 아직 미숙한 점이 많은 저는 아버지의 뜻을 따를 뿐이죠.
first_translate: but I shall follow father’s wishes, considering I still lack experience in various areas.
haah...

hangle: 내가 황태자비가 된다면, 줄곧 중립을 지키던 프리실라 가문도
first_translate: if I marry the crown prince, the priscilla clan-- which maintained its neutrality thus far--

hangle: 황자의 편이 될 거라 생각하는 거겠지.
first_translate: would likely ally itself with the prince.

hangle: 아버지는 내가 싫다는 남자와의 혼사를 무리하게 강요하지는 않지만…
first_translate: father won’t force me to wed against my will,

hangle: 언제까지 아버지의 뜻을 따르겠단 말로 둘러댈 수 있을지.
first_translate: but I wonder how long I can continue using that as an excuse.
it’s time to find a way.

hangle: 우리 가문과 격이 맞는 미혼의 남자라면…
first_translate: unmarried men suitable for our status include...
...marquess clovis and prince siegern.

hangle: 하지만 시그렌 황자가 상대가 된다면 아버지는 중립의 자리를 버려야 하니 안 돼.
first_translate: but if I choose prince siegren, father would have to give up his neutral stance, so that option is off-limits.
and as for marquess clovis...
lady livia.
oh dear.
prince siegwald, lady fiona.
I didn’t realize you two were visiting the palace today.
who is this girl again?

hangle: 황후 폐하께서 주최하는 무도회에서나 볼 줄 알았는데,
first_translate: I thought I’d meet you both at the ball hosted by her majesty,
but I suppose fate brought us together sooner.

hangle: 아~ 그 젊은 사람들이 많이 온다는 무도회 말인가요?
first_translate: oh! you mean the event popular among younger folks?
exactly.
many couples met each other there.
really?
has lady livia considered choosing a partner for herself...?
oh?

hangle: 역시 이 녀석보다 귀여운 영애는 이 궁에 없는 건가.
first_translate: isn’t she the prettiest lady in the entire palace?
be passionate.
he can’t tear himself away from her.
uhoho.

hangle: 부럽네요, 영애는 혼처를 고민할 일이 없어서.
first_translate: I envy you, lady livia. you don’t have to worry about whom to marry.
get married?

hangle: 이번 무도회에서 즐거운 일이 생기실지도 모르겠는 걸요.
first_translate: perhaps something wonderful awaits you at the upcoming ball.

hangle: 누군가가 무언가를 열심히 준비하고 있을지 누가 알아요.
first_translate: after all, nobody knows whether somebody is preparing something special for you.
preparing something?
like what...?
you did receive her majesty’s invitation, yes?
huh? y-yes.
lady livia, I apologize, but I’ll catch up with you later.
an imperial invitation...

hangle: 황후가 주최하는 연례 무도회 중 하나에 초대되었다는 증서.
first_translate: proof that I’ve been invited to attend one of the annual balls held by the empress.

hangle: 사교계 시즌 초반에 열리는 연례 무도회는 주로 젊은 사람들이 많이 참가한다던데.
first_translate: the annual ball held early in the season apparently attracts mostly young participants.

hangle: 여기서 ‘젊음’의 기준은 성인이 막 된 10대 후반에서 20대 후반 정도로 다들 어리단다.
first_translate: “young” refers to teenagers who barely reached adulthood and adults in their mid-twenties.

hangle: 리비아의 말대로 그곳에서 연이 깊어진 사람도 많다는 듯해…
first_translate: as livia mentioned earlier, numerous couples formed relationships there...
but none of that concerns me.
your grace.
an imperial invitation, huh?
has the time arrived already?
so tell me,
will sigwald accompany you?
